//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	set ( "crash", $random( 0, 2 )$ );

	if ( $get( FLOAT, "crash")$, $<$, $1.000$ )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/misc/events/crash01.mp3" );
	}


	else (  )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/misc/events/crash02.mp3" );
	}

}
